name: Pablo Silva
description: Pablo was a loyal member of the6th StreetleaderRick Morton. AfterWill Gunnerand his people organised a coup and killed Morton, Pablo was made a scapegoat, with Gunner's people proclaiming that he conspired with the corpos and killed Morton on their orders. After assuming his position as the new leader of the gang, Gunner sent his people to hunt the ones remaining loyal to Morton, including Pablo. Not long after Morton's death, Pablo contacted with anNCPDofficer to give him some important documents. While on his way to the meeting with the officer, Pablo contacted his wife Salma and asked her...
